comment.author: 81594342@N00
comment._content:
I saw this on TV as I was living in Spain: A 747 from KLM crashed into a 747 from British Airways on the runway.

It is still the biggest plane accident with around 800-1000 persons dead.

There where very few survivors if any as both planes where still at full speed.

comment.author: 25318176@N08
comment._content: it was a KLM plane and a Pan Am plane. 583 people died, 61 survived.

comment.author: 81594342@N00
comment._content:
Thanks for the update. I was actually citing by heart...
I was a kid then and remember having been watching this on Spanish TV. It was news for months.

comment._content: The PH-BUF ''Rijn'' and the N736PA ''Clipper Victor''.
